text: Mba nden hi bigi, Fhe Bakɨme khuen nza khɨvigi, ana tɨvar vhuuŋra zɨn vov nza mbui tɨvi ga nzuav, nza nzuai. Nde zaa ndi, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nde Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga ŋgu khavi. Nde maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme nde muuŋgim, nde guigira ana wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mba ana piin ki ntɨɨri, nde mbe phorgɨ kɨrga tuktɨgi.
